mapper.insert: insert into device (id, user_id, model, sn, code_Url, config, life_status, type, produce_date, activate_date, scrap_date, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{codeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{config,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lifeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{produceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{activateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scrapDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update device set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, model = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_Url = #{codeUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, config = #{config,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, life_status = #{lifeStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, produce_date = #{produceDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, activate_date = #{activateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, scrap_date = #{scrapDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, model, sn, code_Url, config, life_status, type, produce_date, activate_date, scrap_date, create_time, update_time from device where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select id, user_id, model, sn, code_Url, config, life_status, type, produce_date, activate_date, scrap_date, create_time, update_time from device

select d.id as id,d.user_id as userId,d.config as config,d.sn as sn,d.scrap_date as scrapDate,d.model as model,d.produce_date as produceDate,d.activate_date as activateDate,u.real_name as patientName,d.update_time as updateTime from device d left join user u on d.user_id = u.id where 1=1
and d.config LIKE concat('%',#{config,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and u.real_name LIKE concat('%',#{patientName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and d.user_id is not null
and d.user_id is null
mapper.update: UPDATE device SET user_id=NULL WHERE id=#{deviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
